segments.advisor_message: So, as we dive in today, what are some of the specific goals you have in mind that you’d like to tackle? Anything in particular you wanna focus on?
segments.client_message: Yeah, I think I'm really looking to save more for retirement, and maybe also like explore some investment options for my kids' education. Those are kinda my main things right now.

segments.advisor_message: That sounds like a solid plan! Saving for retirement is super important, and education for your kids—definitely a great focus. Are there any specific timelines or amounts you have in mind?
segments.client_message: Well, for retirement, I've kinda been thinking, maybe I should aim for like, I don't know, at least a million by the time I hit sixty-five. And for education, I guess, just whatever I can manage each month, y'know?

segments.advisor_message: Got it! A million by sixty-five is a good benchmark. And for the kids, consistent savings will help a lot. Have you already started any investment accounts for them?
segments.client_message: Yeah, I opened a few, like, I think a 529 plan. Just want to make sure I’m on the right track with that stuff, ya know?
